text:
Victoria Kalima Phiri (4 October 1972 – 11 June 2018) was a Zambian politician. She served as Minister of Gender until her death in 2018. She was also a member of the National Assembly for Kasenengwa from 2011 until her death in 2018.
Kalima died at Maina Soko Military Hospital in Lusaka on 11 June 2018 after an illness, aged 45.
